database.name: VIEW GTS_MONITORING_STOCK_LINE_V
database.view: SELECT mt.m_transaction_id AS gts_monitoring_stock_line_v_id, mt.ad_client_id, mt.ad_org_id, mt.updated, mt.updatedby, mt.isactive, mt.created, mt.createdby, mw.name AS warehause, ml.value AS stroge_bin, mt.m_product_id AS gts_monitoring_stock_v_id, mt.m_product_id, mp.value AS kode_produk, mp.name AS nama_produk, gsm.name AS movementtype, mt.movementdate, mt.movementqty, (mi.documentno || '-') || to_char(mi.movementdate, 'DD-MM-YYYY') AS goodshiment_line, minn.name AS phisycal_inventory, (mm.documentno || '-') || mm.name AS movementline, (mpd.documentno || '-') || mpd.name AS production_line, (mpr.value || '-') || mpr.name AS projection_issue FROM m_transaction mt LEFT JOIN m_product mp ON mp.m_product_id = mt.m_product_id LEFT JOIN m_locator ml ON ml.m_locator_id = mt.m_locator_id LEFT JOIN m_warehouse mw ON mw.m_warehouse_id = ml.m_warehouse_id LEFT JOIN gts_status_movement_v gsm ON gsm.value = mt.movementtype LEFT JOIN m_inoutline mil ON mil.m_inoutline_id = mt.m_inoutline_id LEFT JOIN m_inout mi ON mi.m_inout_id = mil.m_inout_id LEFT JOIN m_inventoryline minnl ON minnl.m_inventoryline_id = mt.m_inventoryline_id LEFT JOIN m_inventory minn ON minn.m_inventory_id = minnl.m_inventory_id LEFT JOIN m_movementline mml ON mml.m_movementline_id = mt.m_movementline_id LEFT JOIN m_movement mm ON mm.m_movement_id = mml.m_movement_id LEFT JOIN m_productionline mpl ON mpl.m_productionline_id = mt.m_productionline_id LEFT JOIN m_productionplan mpp ON mpp.m_productionplan_id = mpl.m_productionplan_id LEFT JOIN m_production mpd ON mpd.m_production_id = mpp.m_production_id LEFT JOIN c_projectissue mpri ON mpri.c_projectissue_id = mt.c_projectissue_id LEFT JOIN c_project mpr ON mpr.c_project_id = mpri.c_project_id LEFT JOIN gts_monitoring_stock_v ON gts_monitoring_stock_v.m_product_id = mt.m_product_id ORDER BY mt.movementdate DESC
